coreAttributes.name: demonstone spear
coreAttributes.description: A common type of demonstone has been cut and enchanted into an ethereal spearpoint to create a weapon that causes elemental damage, the rest of the spearhead is wide and blunt to limit a risk of truly deadly injury. Or the wielder can channel some of their aura into it and cast a spell.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Slash and stab at [npc.name] in melee, causing elemental damage!
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of [npc.her] spear, and [npc.verb(prepare)] to use it to fight [npc.herself] in combat.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Thrusting out with [npc.her] Crystal Spear, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to stab [npc2.name] in the chest, the demonstone speartip passing through [npc2.her] torso to drain [npc2.her] energy!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Crystal Spear, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to slash through [npc2.her] [npc2.arm] with the demonstone speartip and drain [npc2.her] energy!

With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(lunge)] out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Crystal Spear, sinking the demonstone speartip into [npc2.her] shoulder and causing [npc2.herHim] to lose some energy!
hitDescriptions.criticalHitText: Expertly sidestepping around [npc2.namePos] attempt to block [npc.her] attack, [npc.name] [npc.verb(deal)] a devastating strike with [npc.her] Crystal Spear!

missDescriptions.missText: Thrusting out with [npc.her] Crystal Spear, [npc.name] [npc.verb(attempt)] to stab [npc2.name] in the chest, but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Crystal Spear, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(lunge)] out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Crystal Spear, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
